title: Undergrads launch popular virtual summer camp for teens
author: Maya Mirsky
excerpt: Saumya Goyal and Danielle Egan, both BS 21, were texting late-night after the coronavirus pandemic started when Egan shared a startup idea: How about a new program that helps connect bored teenage students to some fun classes during the pandemic? Goyal loved the idea and the pair worked out the details to co-found startup Connect-in-Place, [â¦] The post Undergrads launch popular virtual summer camp for teens appeared first on Haas News | Berkeley Haas.
